source_objects.title: Industry
source_objects.description: Break into new industries from healthcare, to veterinary medicine or event planning.

items.title: METALLURGY AND CORROSION ENGINEERING FOR AIM/RBI

visible_instructors.name: Mahendra Kumar
visible_instructors.job_title: Technical Authority in Oil & Gas Industry | Metallury Expert
visible_instructors.title: Mahendra Kumar Rastogi

items.headline: An introduction to metallurgy and corrosion mechanisms for AIM(asset integrity management) & RBI (risk based inspection)
objectives_summary: Metallurgy , Material selection , Welding , Corrosion monitoring & Control for Asset Integrity Management
Damage mechanisms & Risk Based Inspection

items.title: Aerospace Engineering: Airplane design and Aerodynamic basic

visible_instructors.name: Anzijs
visible_instructors.job_title: Airline Operations and Flight Dispatch Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Anzijs Vilcevskis

items.headline: Master aircraft and engine designs, parts and components, aerodynamics and classification
objectives_summary: Aircraft and airplane classification by various parameters.
Most of airplane designs and configurations and how these impacts its spectrum of use.
General aerodynamics of airplanes: forces of a flight, laminar and turbulent flows, stalls, supersonic flights, airplane stability, etc.

items.title: ISO/IEC 17025: 2017 - Basic Understanding - made easy

visible_instructors.name: Subhasis
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer in Lab Accreditation and IATF 16949 field.
visible_instructors.title: Subhasis Mallik

items.headline: For SCIENTISTS, ENGINEERS and MANAGERS
objectives_summary: This course will provide a basic understanding on ISO/IEC 17025-2017 accreditation process of testing and calibration laboratory.
It will help an existing non-accredited commercial laboratory or internal laboratory of a manufacturing organization prepare for accreditation in a systematic manner.
Those who are working in accredited laboratory but not having in-depth understanding of the standard will get good insight about the requirements of standard.

items.title: Planning Hybrid Photovoltaic-Diesel Energy Systems
items.headline: Learn to plan off grid power systems combining solar electric and diesel generators
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, students will be able to plan off grid power plants combining solar electric and diesel generators

items.title: Aircraft Maintenance Understanding the FARs

visible_instructors.name: Clarence
visible_instructors.job_title: Publishing Director, Author, Entrepreneur, Avionics Tech
visible_instructors.title: Clarence Moore

visible_instructors.name: Kandia Shante
visible_instructors.job_title: Political Commentator, Author, Virtual Assistant, Freelancer
visible_instructors.title: Kandia Shante Jackson

items.headline: Your Guide to The Aircraft Maintenance Federal Aviation Regulation (FAR) Title 14 CFR Parts 1, 3, 65
objectives_summary: Learn the FARs for Aviation Maintenance Technicians
Learn how to navigate the Title 14 CFR Parts 1,3, 65 and 91
Learn your privileges and limitations as a powerplant and/or airframe rated mechanic

items.title: Updating Your Digital Music Distribution

visible_instructors.name: Gigi
visible_instructors.job_title: University Instructor, Music Marketing and Branding; Singer
visible_instructors.title: Gigi Johnson

items.headline: Learn how to promote your music, digital music distribution techniques, and building community of Super Fans
objectives_summary: Students will finish the course understanding:
"Why?" -- Why should I do anything other than getting my music on iTunes?  Why do my fans engage in what they do online – and not my website?  Why do other groups spend time where they do?
"Who?" -- Who loves my work?  Who do they hang out with digitally and who can they influence for me?  Who will help pay for a full and robust living for my music?

items.title: Fire Analysis of Steel Structures according to Eurocodes
items.headline: Standard Fire Resistance calculation to EN 1991-1-2, EN 1993-1-2. Includes worked examples.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to calculate standard fire resistance of steel structural elements

items.title: How to Build a Language-Tutoring Business on the Cloud
items.headline: Become a "Cloud-Tutor" and learn to teach hundreds of paying language students in less than one hour a day.

items.title: Introduction to Bioplastics and Biopolymers
items.headline: Sources, applications, chemistry and production processes
objectives_summary: What biopolymers and bioplastics are
The different classifications
Chemical structures of biopolymers

items.title: AC/DC Motors and Drives
items.headline: Industrial Maintenance
objectives_summary: AC/DC Motors and Drives
You will understand Drives and Control's
You will have a working knowledge of how to program and troubleshoot an AC/DC Drives.

items.title: Healthcare 4.0 - Healthcare in the Industry 4.0
items.headline: Learn about how the Healthcare Industry is being transformed in Industry 4.0
objectives_summary: Understand what the Healthcare Industry is and its role in society
Discover key insights of the Healthcare Industry to understand its importance
Learn the Challenges of the Healthcare Industry​

items.title: Aviation Meteorology: Airport Weather

visible_instructors.name: Anzijs
visible_instructors.job_title: Airline Operations and Flight Dispatch Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Anzijs Vilcevskis

items.headline: METAR, TAF, SNOWTAM, Runway report, Weather depiction, Wind components, Approach categories, Aircraft performance
objectives_summary: Learn general meteorological knowledge
Understand how aerodrome weather impact airline and aircraft operations and performance
Learn how aerodrome weather is collected and reported (AWOS, ATIS, D-ATIS, VOLMET)

items.title: Selling Residential Solar for Contractors and Entrepreneurs

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: The Ultimate Solar Sales Course Producer
visible_instructors.title: David Sugrue

items.headline: Designed for contractors, roofers, and entrepreneurs who want to expand into the $2B market for residential solar energy
objectives_summary: In ths course you will learn about the residential solar energy market, financing techniques, sales methodologies and how to close profitable deals
Understand how to start a solar energy business and how to sell solar.

items.title: Be an International Business Professional
items.headline: International Business, International Marketing, Market Research, Globalization, Export, Import, International Expansion
objectives_summary: Analyze international business from a multi-centric perspective
Analyze market entry and market location decisions
How to successfully conduct International Market Research

items.title: Micro-Renewable energy for Beginners
items.headline: Learn about micro-renewable energy from an expert with 20 years experience
objectives_summary: Assess the viability of each type of micro-renewable energy
Calculate a particular products output or understand how it is done
Optimise the deployment of micro-renewable energy technology

items.title: Steel Re-Rolling Mill: Basic TMT Rebar Production Course
items.headline: Basic Steel Rebar Production Guide
objectives_summary: Will get an idea about how to make steel rebar
How to calculate area, reduction rate, unit weight, mill speed, mill rpm and motor rpm
How to design roll pass
